record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - October 04, 2007)

[Page: S12812]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Earl Rilington and Eric Perritt, fellows serving in Senator Cochran's office, be granted the privilege of the floor during consideration of the Departments of Commerce and Justice, Science, and related agencies appropriations bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
